title: Have you ever wondered if there was a Piltovan kid who likes hanging out with Zaunite kids?
body: You know like Sabo from one piece? It would be quite interesting .

replies.body:
You'd probably find them hanging out (and getting into mischief) around the Boundary Markets.

http://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/region/zaun/?mv=true
Probably not uncommon actually. Though class differences probably lead to such friendships becoming short lived.
I mean at some point a piltie child is gonna want a friend like a zaunite, and know that that's their friend. I hope piltie parents dont try to push their opinions on their children to hard.
It's a Romeo and Juliet tale waiting to happen. Or a gang war.
My theory from jinx's new lore is, that she was once a piltover kid who was raised in Zan, hence why some thougt she couldn't fit in
And also why she's so clean.

Out of the champions, I'd assume the reworked Orianna lore might suggest that at one point she may have been friends with kids from Zaun, despite having been born, and raised in Piltover. Although who she would've been friends with is the question, it's a possibility that you might be interested in.
Jinx and Vi is still mysterious though... only them that have relation to both...
Aren't there areas where both cities mingle? Could've sworn the Progress Day story (before we knew the ending) had kids from different cities.
They are probably like the sneeches (I think that's how you spell it) where the parents won't let this happen.
